title: Custom games problem
body:
Hi would like to say a few problems that all players have that play custom games
1. the pause function is a completely useless function that it's only purpose is for trolls to ruin the game even more(best way to fix it is limit the use of the /pause to 3 times per user, remove it completely or allow games owners to disable this function
2. game owners need more rights ingame to deal with trolls or players that just ruin it for everyone else. For example, allow game owners to call a vote to kick/remove a player from the game
3. Add a link to the riot support pages on the games menu(Next to settings button or in the help menu on the client)

these are needed for players who enjoy custom games(like Hide & seek & others)
